questions.text: What is the best answer to define OAuth?

answers.text: An authorization framework that enables 3rd party applications to obtain limited access to a web service
A simple way to publish and interact with protected data
A more safe and secure way to give you access to data

questions.text: A microservice is an architecture that structures an application as ___________.

answers.text: A way to safe way to secure an application
A load balanced method of interacting with HTTP
The practice of integrating changes from different developers in the team into a mainline as early as possible.
The practice of integrating changes from different developers in the team into a mainline as close to the due date as possible.
Software designed to integrate changes without an administrator’s input.
Running software 24 hours per day, so the business increases it’s productivity
